snippet: Carrie Underwood gains the top slot, but the Beastie Boys' catalogue saw a boost in sales after the death of one of its members, Adam Yauch, last week.
abstract: Carrie Underwood gains the top slot, but the Beastie Boys' catalogue saw a boost in sales after the death of one of its members, Adam Yauch, last week.

headline.main: Beastie Boys Return to the Top 20
